tool_description: An API to calculate the railway period of a UTC date in milliseconds since epoch (Unix timestamp).

api_list.name: Get Railway Period for UTC date
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the railway period corresponding to a given UTC date in milliseconds since epoch. The railway period is defined between the years 1969-1970 and 2243-2244.

required_parameters.name: millis
required_parameters.description: The UTC date in milliseconds since epoch.
